item.description:
We will meet in the back parking area of Pier One closest to the trail entry and plan to start running north on the trail at 9:00am. Distance and pace will vary so beginners should not be intimidated.

I will not be here this week but we have enough regulars now that you won't even miss me. While you are out on the trail I'll be running the Miami Marathon.
item.name: PIER 1 - SUNDAY RUN
